//settings Ringtone Silent Billing Subscription Upload the videos when wifi is available Upload Quality Specify video quality for uploads Notifications Choose notification sound About Sesyme is a peer to peer e-learning platform for university students designed for the purpose to help students with their study-related questions and create an environment where students from different universities can co-learn, communicate and share knowledge. 2.5 Got any queries? We are happy to help! Send Feedback FAQ View frequently asked questions http://www.sefnet.co.za/terms&conditions.php Edit Delete Report Hide this post Search Likes Questions Answers Click to verify your Email We will respond via email to feedback and questions. You may also send feedback to all@innet.co.za> Please choose a Category Post Question Answer Comment Post Image Type your Question Provide more details Feedback You Can Browse Answers And See How Other People Tackle Questions, Put Their Perspective On Same Interest/Topics. ACQUIRE KNOWLEDGE READ YOUR E-BOOKS ASK QUESTIONS To Make Your Learning Experience Easier And Fun.You Want Someone On Standby To Answer Your Questions Whenever You Encounter Challenges.

Let Us Feed Your Brain Sorry there is no content to be shown, Click on the button bellow to ask a question Be the first to ask a question ask It appears you have not posted anything yet, start posting today Browse questions and answers of other students,organized into your interest to help you boost your knowledge BOOST YOUR KNOWLEDGE Sesyme is a question and answer application for university students. CO-LEARNING PLATFORM https sesyme.com Cancel Share Be the first to reply Request Call Was this answer helpful? Yes No Like Reply 0 replies Error Loading Image Write something about yourself save Personal Details Name and Surname Staff Number About Version Terms and Conditions Privacy Policy Manage Notifications Edited Create Profile Information: 
When you create an account and profile on Sesyme Application, we collect your full name, academic details and other information you provide, such as interests. Your name, photo,affiliation,University and course and any other information that you choose to add to your public-facing profile will be available for viewing to users of the Sesyme Application. Once you create a profile, other users will be able to see in your profile certain information about your activity on the Sesyme Application, such as the questions and answers you post, categories of interest to you, the information you list as credentials, and your edits to Your posts. #Data Collection: We collect and store the information and content that you post to the Sesyme Application, including your questions, answers, photos, and comments. Your Content, date and time stamps, and all associated comments are publicly viewable on the Sesyme Application, along with your full name.

Feedback Records:
When you communicate with us (via email, through the Sesyme Application, or otherwise), we may maintain a record of your communication. 

Integrated Service Provider and Linked Networks: 
You can elect to sign in or sign up to the Sesyme Application through a linked network (i.e.Google). If you elect to sign up through or connect a Linked Network, we receive certain profile and account information about you from the Linked Network.The specific information provided to us by Linked Networks is determined by these third parties and may vary by network. In all cases, the permissions page for the Linked Network will describe the information being shared. You should consult their respective privacy policies for information about their practices. 

Automatically Collected Information About Your Activity: 
We use tracking technologies to automatically collect information about your activities, such as your searches, date and time of your visit, and other information about your use of the Sesyme Application.We also collect and may store information that your mobile device provides to us in connection with your use of the Sesyme Application such as your mobile device,unique device identifier. We also receive information when you view content on or otherwise interact with the Sesyme Application. Loadingâ€¦ What would you like to attach? A Tool for the Mind No notifications to show (Lecturer) Verified Unverified Agriculture Theology Geography Helpful Helped Group Name Privacy Save bio Create Type a message moments ago Group Description Submit Type an option Expired Title of your article Publish Write an article Upload a document Write your article Admin Members Search a keyword Title of your Quiz First Choice Second Choice Third Choice Fourth Choice Question1 Quiz publish date: Now the quiz will be released to others on this date Answers publish date: the answers will be shown to others after this date Next Question Please select a correct answer for marking purpose Finish Search friends to add Sesyme Help We are here to help If you're not sure how to use Sesyme, type your question here. You can also report problems or add your suggestions. General Cluster Student Community A group for non-academic related flimflam, gibberish, hodgepodge or jibber-jobber stuffs that you'd prefer to keep out of your academic groups. Join Say Hello! Explore Courses Later Accept Reject Requests Profile Create Cluster Update Members are only added by admin Anybody can search and join the group SELECT GROUP VERSION BELOW Please note: Creating a Group its free but after 200 messages sent/received you will be required to upgrade to Premium version if you still want to continue engaging with other students. Free Trial Premium Version On free trial you can add members up to 15 members and create quizzes,your trial ends when you have reached 200 messages in a group with limited attachments upload On premium you can add members up to 250,create quizzes,polls and unlimited attachments Pay Now Pay Later Continue You have reached your trial limit, please upgrade to continue using this cluster Birth date Edit Bio Home Notification News Feed Info Portal Clusters Books
